tuv.seg: In a number of areas of local government activity, more indepth discussion and consideration of matters can take place at committee level, rather than at meetings of the full council
I roinnt réimse de ghníomhaíocht rialtais áitiúil, is féidir plé, díospóireacht agus breithniúchán níos doimhne a bheith ann ag leibhéal coiste, seachas ag cruinnithe na comhairle iomláine
Following on from the Government's 1996 discussion paper 'Better Local Government', a new and more structured committee system was introduced for local authorities
I ndiaidh phlépháipéar 1996 an Rialtais 'Better Local Government', tugadh isteach córas coiste nua agus níos struchtúrtha le haghaidh túdaráis áitiúla
This new system replaced some of the ad-hoc committees which had evolved over the years
Cuireadh an córas nua in áit cuid de na coistí ad-hoc a tháinig chun cinn thar na blianta
Creating a local authority committee
Coiste údaráis áitiúil a chruthú
To create a committee, the council passes a resolution at a council meeting
Chun coiste a bhunú, glacann an Chomhairle rún ag cruinniú Comhairle
The committee must consist of at least 3 members of the council
Ní foláir do thriúr bhall den Chomhairle ar a laghad a bheith ar an gcoiste
You cannot be a member of a local authority committee if you are not a member of the council unless you have knowledge, qualifications or experience relating to the functions of the committee
Ní fhéadfá a bheith i do bhall de choiste údaráis áitiúil muna bhfuil tú i do bhall den Chomhairle ach amháin má tá eolas, cáilíochtaí, nó taithí agat a bhaineann le feidhmiú an choiste
The council can, by resolution, delegate some its functions to a committee if at least ½ of the members of the council vote in favour of the resolution
D'fhéadfadh an Chomhairle cuid dá dualgais a thiomnú do choiste trí rún má ghlacann ar a laghad leath de bhaill na Comhairle leis an rún
However, it cannot delegate the adoption of the annual local authority budget
Ní fhéadfadh sí, áfach, glacadh buiséad bliantúil an údaráis áitiúil a thiomnú
The council also cannot delegate the power to create the Development Plan, decide on rates or borrow money
Ní fhéadfadh sí, ach oiread, an chumhacht chun Plean Forbartha a chruthú, rátaí a leagann síos, nó airgead a fháil ar iasacht a thiomnú
The council must establish strategic policy committees (SPCs) to formulate, develop, monitor and review policy relating to the authority's functions

Ní foláir don Chomhairle coistí polasaí stráitéiseach (CPSs) a bhunú chun polasaithe a bhaineann le feidhmiú na Comhairle a chur in eagar, a fhorbairt agus maoirseacht agus athbhreithniú a dhéanamh orthu
The SPCs must advise the local authority on policy
Caithfidh na CPSs comhairle pholasaí a thabhairt don údarás áitiúil
Two or more local authorities can establish joint committees to perform the functions of the local authorities
D'fhéadfadh dhá údarás ar a laghad "Comhchoistí" a bhunú chun dualgais na n-údarás áitiúil a chomhlíonadh
Each member of the local authority must serve on at least one SPC
Ní mór do gach ball den údarás áitiúil freastal ar SPC amháin ar a laghad

Special guidelines regarding these committees have been issued by the Minister for Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government and are set down in Part 7, Sections 48-54 of the Local Government Act 2001
D’eisigh an tAire Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobal agus Rialtais Áitiúil na treoirlínte seo maidir leis na coistí seo agus tá siad leagtha síos i gCuid 7, Rannóga 48-54 den Acht Rialtais Áitiúil 2001
This legislation sets out the arrangements which apply to the establishment of these committees
Leagann an reachtaíocht seo amach na socruithe a bhaineann le bunú na gcoistí seo
About two-thirds of the membership of these committees is made up of elected members.The remaining third consists of representatives of sectoral interests
Is baill tofa iad beagnach dhá thrian de bhallríocht na gcoistí seo. Ionadaithe leasanna earnála is ea an trian atá fágtha
For example, representatives of community, environmental, business, trade union, farming interests
Mar shampla, ionadaithe ó leasanna pobail, comhshaoil, gnó, ceardchumainn, feirmeoireachta
The chairperson of each committee must be an elected member of the council
Ní mór do chathaoirleach gach coiste a bheith ina bhall tofa den chomhairle
Chairs of each committee are appointed by the council for a minimum period of three years
Ceapann an chomhairle cathaoirligh gach coiste ar feadh tréimhse nach faide ná trí bliana
